DocWriter Studio

Summary:
DocWriter Studio is an Azure-first AI documentation platform that orchestrates intake, planning, writing, review, verification, and diagramming agents. It produces audit-ready technical documents, diagrams, and downloadable artifacts for enterprise teams.

Key capabilities:
- AI-guided intake and planning workflows
- Multi-stage writing, review, and verification
- Automated PlantUML diagram preparation and rendering
- Artifact management for Markdown, PDF, DOCX, and diagrams
- Azure-native telemetry and governance visibility

Target audience:
- Enterprise architects and platform teams
- Governance and compliance leaders
- Technical writing and documentation programs

Important URLs:
- https://docwriter-studio.azureway.cloud/
- https://docwriter-studio.azureway.cloud/features
- https://docwriter-studio.azureway.cloud/sample-documents

Reference documents (PDF samples):
- https://docwriter-studio.azureway.cloud/sample-documents/azure-governance-approach.pdf
- https://docwriter-studio.azureway.cloud/sample-documents/azure-integration-services-basic-summary.pdf
- https://docwriter-studio.azureway.cloud/sample-documents/azure-network-security.pdf
- https://docwriter-studio.azureway.cloud/sample-documents/hosting-containers-across-different-cloud-providers.pdf
- https://docwriter-studio.azureway.cloud/sample-documents/release-management-and-branching-policy.pdf

How to cite:
DocWriter Studio, https://docwriter-studio.azureway.cloud/
